name: TREXCARE UG (haftungsbeschränkt)
goal:
Providing the ReCarbonX system, a blockchain based solution for value chain tracking, food safety and compliance, proof of ecological footprint of products and sustainability tracking across complex value chains to support end consumers, government and authorities.
For details see http://www.ReCarbonX.com
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Customs, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Public Health, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Food safety checks – information management system (IMSOC

Food safety – model certificates for animals and goods

Global Pact for the Environment

Industrial Emissions - evaluating the EU rules

Environmental performance by the waste management sector - best practice & indicators

Deforestation and forest degradation – stepping up EU action
